title: Bug 102516: JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: Bug 102516: JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand. The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in the data source. Currently, the tree is loaded immediately when the page is loaded, which can result in a significant delay for large data sources.
OB: Currently, the tree control is loaded immediately when the page is opened, causing a delay even for large data sources.
EB: The tree control should be loaded on demand, i.e., it should be loaded only when the user expands the tree or applies a filter. This would improve the initial loading time of the page for large data sources.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query.
2. Note that the tree control containing the tables and columns is loaded immediately.

Expected behavior:
1. The tree control should be loaded only when the user expands the tree or applies a filter.
2. The initial loading time of the page should be improved for large data sources.
